    • Method Detail

      • add

        public ValueArray add(java.lang.Object object)
        Add an object to the array.

        The value is added added to the end of the array. The following are equivalent: 

        
    va.add(obj);
    va.add(new SimpleValue(obj));
    va.add(obj, va.size);
    va.add(new SimpleValue(obj), va.size);
        Specified by:
        add in interface ValueArray
        Parameters:
        object - the object to add
        Returns:
        this ValueArray

      • add

        public ValueArray add(Value value)
        Add a value to the array.

        The value is added added to the end of the array. The following are equivalent: 

        
    va.add(val);
    va.add(val, va.size);
        Specified by:
        add in interface ValueArray
        Parameters:
        value - the value to add
        Returns:
        this ValueArray

      • addAll

        public ValueArray addAll(ValueArray array)
        Description copied from interface: ValueArray
        Add all the values to the array.

        The values are added to the array at the end.

        Specified by:
        addAll in interface ValueArray
        Parameters:
        array - a ValueArray to add
        Returns:
        this ValueArray
